bibl.title: A New Papyrus Text of Apollonius Sophista.
bibl.note: Ed.: W.E.H. Cockle, A New Greek Glossary on Papyrus from Oxyrhynchus, BICS 1981. - "What we seem to have here is a simplified version of the lexicon, one stripped of the scholarly paraphernalia that cluttered the original text - in short, a school edition."
bibl.seg: Haslam Michael W., A New Papyrus Text of Apollonius Sophista.
